articles.description: X owner in talks with government over historic site for event – though Colosseum and Rome ruled out
articles.content:
Elon Musk is in talks with Italys government about hosting his proposed cage fight with Mark Zuckerberg at a historic site in the country, but the Colosseum has been ruled out as a venue.
